data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during SAMBRE cruise from Cruising North Sea started at 1848-07-16

Ship: Sambre (Fregat), Voyage from: Cruising North Sea, Company: MAR, Other ship information: GEBOUWD TE ROTTERDAM, LENGTE 163 VOET, BREEDTE 42 VOET, HOLtE 22 7/11 VOET. WATERVERPLAATSING 1460 TON, BEMANNING 280 KOPPEN, 44 KANONS
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
